name: Doorway Effect
description:
Help Lethe collect their items and escape "The Doorway Effect" to get to school! This short, engaging memory game is a simple but fun experience that anyone can enjoy and you can learn to connect with our main character, Lethe. Explore the different rooms of the house while collecting items that you need for school. Be focused or you might fall prey to the doorway effect... This game was created by Andy Eng, Ashley Lu, Siwen Tao, and Erick Tung. Source code can be found here.

Programming: Andy Eng, Erick Tung, Ashley Lu
Art: Ashley Lu
Sound: Siwen Tao

(The doorway effect happens when you pass through different “doorways,” or sceneries, and your memory declines. More information can be found here.)
